competitors.name: Adobe
competitors.notes: PDF and document solutions before EchoSign

context: In 2005, DocuSign was founded (incorporated 2003) in Seattle. The e-signature market was nascent with limited enterprise adoption. The ESIGN Act (2000) had established legal validity but adoption was slow. DocuSign focused on transaction management platform for real estate and financial services. Competition was minimal as the market was just developing. Most document signing was still paper-based.
